fact_check_explanation_title: There’s no easy way to compare benefit and tax fraud.
fact_check_explanation_summary: This graphic comparing benefit fraud and tax fraud is wrong. It’s difficult to compare DWP and HMRC, and most of the numbers quoted are incorrect.

fact_check_explanation_title: George Soros was not a Nazi SS officer
fact_check_explanation_summary: George Soros was not a Nazi in the Second World War, and a picture claiming to show him as one is actually of the Auschwitz officer Oskar Gröning.

fact_check_explanation_title: Boris Johnson did say this about Gordon Brown becoming Prime Minister without an election
fact_check_explanation_summary: The now Prime Minister said in 2007 that Gordon Brown taking over from Tony Blair was a “scandal”.

fact_check_explanation_title: These tweets are from an Anjem Choudary parody account
fact_check_explanation_summary: Other tweets from that profile indicate it doesn’t belong to the radical preacher.

fact_check_explanation_title: Lamb exports to Japan aren’t due to EU trade deal
fact_check_explanation_summary: It’s incorrect to say we can only export lamb to Japan because of the EU-Japan trade deal. It’s because Japan lifted a ban on lamb imports from the UK.

fact_check_explanation_title: You are at risk of serious facial injuries if your feet are on the dashboard during a car crash
fact_check_explanation_summary: There have been multiple cases of people suffering severe facial injuries from having their feet on a car dashboard during a crash.

fact_check_explanation_title: This picture of a sign about refugees has been digitally altered
fact_check_explanation_summary: The original picture was taken in Canada in 2015, but the edited version was shared by Nigel Farage last year.

fact_check_explanation_title: A picture of a woman voting was taken in Pakistan
fact_check_explanation_summary: The picture isn’t from the 2016 Mayor of London election.

fact_check_explanation_title: Did Boris Johnson write this quote about Liverpudlians and Hillsborough?
fact_check_explanation_summary: He was editor of the Spectator, where the comments appeared.

fact_check_explanation_title: You almost certainly won’t get arrested for flying a British flag
fact_check_explanation_summary: A viral post claims flying terrorist flags is legal but flying the British flag isn’t. This is incorrect.

fact_check_explanation_title: Police numbers under Boris Johnson’s time as Mayor
fact_check_explanation_summary: Police officer numbers fluctuated during Boris Johnson’s time as Mayor of London.

fact_check_explanation_title: Driving in flip flops isn’t an offence, but driving carelessly is
fact_check_explanation_summary: Driving carelessly could lead to a maximum fine of £5,000, 3-9 points on your licence and possibly a driving ban in the most serious cases.
